question: It's a Sunday afternoon. You have nothing planned, no obligations. How do you spend your free time?
The Event Loop: I'm afraid "free time" doesn't exist in my vocabulary. I am a very busy person. If I didn't have any appointments or events to go to, something would be very wrong.
Generator Functions: I'd be spending that time contemplating infinity. Hear me out: an afternoon is just an infinite sequence of infinitely small intervals of time.
Array.reduce: I dunno? Just hanging around the house, browsing random websites?
Implicit Type Coercion: Eating my boogers. I can share next time if you want.
Regexes: /I would go to a (?:park|coffee shop) and have a [gwrtefdal] time\./i

question: If you were deserted on a remote island, but could bring just one thing, what would you choose?
The Event Loop: A phone to call for help, obviously. I serve a number of very busy clients, and would need to get back to civilization as soon as possible.
Generator Functions: One thing, you say...What is "one"? What is a "thing"? We are all just electrons buzzing in the air; we are all connected.
Array.reduce: Can I cheat? If I put a bunch of stuff in a backpack, does that count?
Implicit Type Coercion: Either my comic book collection, or my mom, so she can make me dino tendies.

question: What are you looking for in a partner?
The Event Loop: I'm not looking for a serious relationship right now. Maybe not ever. Why commit myself to one thing?
Generator Functions: I'm hoping it yields something I can keep coming back to again and again.
Array.reduce: I'm looking for my soulmate. Someone who completes me. I want to be with them, heart, body, and soul.
Implicit Type Coercion: Anyone who won't make fun of me for saying that 2 + "2" is "22".

question: Do you speak any other languages?
The Event Loop: The only other language I need is JavaScript.
Generator Functions: It is the case that I speak at least one language.
Array.reduce: Does math count? I'm pretty good at math.
Implicit Type Coercion: I've taught myself Japanese from watching anime. My favorite word is "onii-chan".

question: If you could be any animal, what would you be and why?
The Event Loop: A queen ant. I would enjoy coordinating a whole colony.
Array.reduce: As gross as it sounds, a dung beetle. I just like how they start snowballing stuff into one giant thing.
Implicit Type Coercion: I wish I could be a pony, so I could be friends with Twilight Sparkle.
